description: The reserve and unreserve functions in nova-manage do not raise a NotFound exception when given a non-existent address.
title: Nova-Manage: method calls with bad addresses fail to raise NotFound

comments.content: The reserve and unreserve functions in nova-manage do not raise a NotFound exception when given a non-existent address.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~alex-meade
